cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR

The paper deals with the problem of identifying the same person from multiple camera views, which is a common task in computer vision. The proposed solution involves the use of attention neural models and loss functions, which are commonly used in computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper also involves the use of deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in machine learning, and optimization techniques, which are commonly used in computer science. Therefore, the other likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
